p: At the time of this survey, no internationally recognised definition of drug stockouts existed and we based ourselves on the WHO definition for stockouts of ART as early warning indicators for drug resistance [ 10]. The definition used for this survey is consistent with the patient-focussed definition for stockouts resulting from a WHO convened stakeholder meeting in response to WHA69.25: “The complete absence of the medicine, health product or vaccine at the point of service delivery to the patient”[ 43].
